content.en: Algorithmic gas measurement: Scientists are using satellite data and algorithms to measure greenhouse gases like methane and carbon dioxide in the atmosphere. They are comparing the accuracy of different algorithms, such as the Weighting Function Modified (WFM) DOAS retrieval algorithm, in retrieving these gases. The algorithms are being improved to reduce errors and increase the accuracy of the measurements.
content.da: Algoritmisk gasmåling: Forskere bruger satellitdata og algoritmer til at måle drivhusgasser som metan og kuldioxid i atmosfæren. De sammenligner nøjagtigheden af forskellige algoritmer, såsom Weighting Function Modified (WFM) DOAS retrieval-algoritmen, i at registrere disse gasser. Algoritmerne forbedres for at reducere fejl og øge nøjagtigheden af målingerne.
